body: This app is great for macro counters. It's easy to use, easy to add your own foods and recipes and the bar code scanner is so convenient!

title: Worst app EVER!!
body: Don't waste your $3. The food choices are a joke. Unless you can scan every bar code for every single thing you eat - Don't bother, seriously!! I'm sure you can think of something much better to do with your $3. Is a refund possible????

title: Forgot username
body: You can reset your password but not your username. Dumb.

title: Not too shabby
body: The bar code scanner is tricky at times and it isn't easy searching for foods. Majority of the time I have to manually create which takes time out of my day plugging food into the app. Other than that I like the layout and how it shows me where I stand for my macros

title: Muy buena aplicación
body: Ayuda muchísimo me encanta

title: IIFYM
body: La mejor App para registro de macros 100%recomendada

title: MUY BUENA APP
body: Aparte de que toda esa en ingles, excelente app

title: Love it!
body: Best app ever!

title: Terrible search menu options. Crashes.
body: I just started using this app to track after meeting with a nutritionist. It is terrible in my opinion and not user friendly. Nothing I've tried to look for is in the search menus. The bar code scanner barely works. Lots of issues with crashing and freezing. Very very disappointed in this purchase. Will be looking for something else to use.

title: Just what I was looking for
body: I'm happy with this app - I wanted to experiment with higher protein and lower carbs, and this makes it very easy for me. I've been measuring my food for a year now, started strict Paleo, went to Zone, and now I like this 40/40/20 thing - I've lost 4 pounds in a week (was eating too much fat by about 20g a day). Goal is to gain muscle and get leaner. Only thing I don't like is the lack of exercises that I do in the My Workout + app, it could use some fine tuning. But I love this app, definitely what I needed.

title: User
body: Nice features including bar code scanning. Copy meal and frequent foods make tracking core foods easy! Database search sometimes comes up with weird responses for common foods, but once you've found the right thing, it is easy to reuse. Thank you for a great app...easily the best food/macro tracker I've used.

title: Love!!!!
body: Update for 12/11/16

title: Lots of room for improvement
body: I was hoping this app would give some great benefits and ease of use but have been disappointed.

title: Love this app
body: Trying to finally figure out how to count macros and this app is amazing. I'm an American living in Japan and this app makes inputting the macros a breeze. 10/10 would recommend. I showed his app to a friend yesterday who wants to start gaining mass and told him this is the app that will get him there. Love it. Use it everyday. Add me!

title: Great app
body: Great for tracking macros.  Recipe nutritional calculator, bar code scanner and ability to save frequent personal foods and recipes are big pluses. I've found MM+  to be as customizable as I would like it to be.

title: Not a fan
body: Not a fan of this app. Every time I quick search the food item is not available. Must search by brand type or know all the information to enter yourself. Can't trust the bar code scanner. I've had to correct every thing I've scanned so far. Waste of money.

title: Gym Freak!!!
body: This is the best food tracking app EVER!!! It's the only one that keeps me happy and using it every single day. @Tonya_Son on Instagram for fitness tips and  workouts...

title: Love this app
body: It has made me become more aware of my eating habits. I've been calculating macros with this app for weeks now. Went from 115 to 104 (keep in mind I am 4'10) it is WAY better than my fitness pal. They want a monthly membership to be able to do the things this app does for a one time fee. It's so easy to cook in bulk too. Go to recipes, put in all the ingredients weight you're adding, then weigh everything together at the end and plug that in in the serving area. Awesome app. I can keep on going on the features. If you wanna see the progress this app has done you can go to my IG @missmilinaaa__fitt

title: Bar code scanner inaccurate
body: Multiple times I have scanned items and it is inaccurate. Good thing I check and not assume it's correct. Please fix this ASAP. Thank you.

title: Love It!
body: Easy to use! I absolutely love the Bar Code Scanner!

title: Food options could be better.
body: Great app, great options for ratios and customizing goals ex. weight loss, weight gain, maintaining.

title: Follow Requests??
body: Love the app, but I want to be able to follow my trainers and accept their follow requests??

title: Awesome
body: Awesome

title: The greatest App for Macros
body: Let me tell you I tried a whole lot a macro apps and by far they don't come close to this ones standards. It makes everything so simple for you plus you can add your own macros depending on what food you are eating. And the best feature in my opinion is the bar code scanner feature when you don't have time to look up macros on a certain food product. By far the best macros app out there in the market. What are you waiting for?

title: A great Macros Tracking App
body: Very easy to use. Works like other popular apps, however luckily don't have to pay monthly fees to see your info. Very helpful app. Love the bar code scanner.

title: Great App
body: Everything that I could hope for in a macro's tracker. The bar code scanner is my favorite. Makes it very easy to stay on track.

title: Great App!
body: I just spent time writing a review only to have it deleted because the username I selected was already chosen. Wth??

title: Good tool
body: For someone who has used weight watchers app in the past, I think this one is good, but the WW has more food options and is easier to use.  I can follow other users but they can't follow me, this is an issue when you're apart of a team. I wish that when it syncs with my Fitbit that my calories burned would work into my calories allowed.  Some good some not so good features, not sure if it was worth the price.

title: Great App
body: Better than any other fitness/meal tracker Ive used in the past. The bar code scanner doesn't always work or recognize the product, but I will manually add. The only thing I wish this app would do...allow the user to adjust the type if serving.  For example, I don't want to calculate my grams if I know the ounces.

title: Great app
body: As with anything else it may take you a couple of days to navigate the app but it's really easy. I'm very happy with it.  Lots of food options and you have the ability to add foods if they do not come up on a bar code.

title: Easy, convenient and great
body: Great app to help keep track of your macros if you're constantly on the go. Love the bar code scanner.

title: Broken and Worthless App
body: Well designed app but it is frustrating to use. Want to log your Dorito chip intake? The only logging option is per single chip. How does one add up all the broken pieces? The bar code scanner quit working. When it was working the bar code scanner did not recognize many common foods. Logging quantity of food intake is about worthless because common units are usually missing as an input. Want to add a banana? The logging unit is one cup mashed. Why no grams or ounces - you know, typical units of kitchen scales. Do not waste your money on this app unless you want to spend all your time working out unit conversions and searching the internet for nutrition data information.

title: Mrs
body: I absolutely love this app!! I am a trainer and a figure competitor so I count my macros year round. It took me some time to figure the app out but the more familiar I have gotten, the more short cuts I have found. (The tutorials were very helpful.) I initially liked the app but kept using fit click (on my computer) but because I was going to be traveling over seas for a few weeks — I felt I needed to force myself to get familiar with it as I would be tracking while traveling. I am so glad I did! It has been so easy to track — even on the road! I can’t say enough good things about this app. I find it very easy to add custom foods (which I typically do for all my food to ensure my numbers are accurate) — even w/out using the bar code scanner. Again - I couldn’t recommend this app enough. The only thing I would like to see is a web site that we could use to track that would be linked. When I am at home, working from my computer, using a web page may be a little faster for me but overall - no complaints.

title: Love it!
body: I love I can set different macros every day! I also like receiving the weekly overview via email. Food selection is decent and bar code scanning has greatly improved. Takes a little figuring out, but once you set everything up, it is a great app for managing calories and macros!!!

title: Not worth it
body: This app does not allow for you to put in your own measurements. If a certain food pops up as a cup but I only had 1/2 a cup you can't input that. Even when bar code scanning. If the label gives info for one tablespoon but I measured & only used a teaspoon. You can't change that either. Therefore I don't feel it gives an accurate total. Some top brands of items aren't listed. Jarrow protein powder. I'm having buyers remorse.

title: Just what I needed.
body: I was looking for an app to track my macros and this is the best I've used. I love that you can set your goals and it shows you what you've consumed and also what you have left. The food search is pretty good although I did find a few items listed were off from the actual nutrition facts. The bar code scanner is super useful for popular products, I just double check that the amounts are correct. I would love more social options with those in my circle like messaging or commenting. Adding a spot for water consumed would be great, too. Nice app!

title: Amazing !!!!
body: if you are serious about counting macros do yourself a favor and get this app.Its that good !!

title: Awesome
body: Awesome

title: Poor food database. Not worth the money.
body: This app has poor food database. MyFitnessPal is a free app and is way better. Extensive food database, easy to use and has a bar code scanner. I'm so disappointed with this app and it's a waste of my money. Except for d convenient food diary log which shows you how much macros you still need and that it can calculate ur calories based on your measurements, this app is not really worth it. Im deleting it.

title: LOVE IT
body: I have been into fitness since January and ways used my Fitbit to track my macros but it was so hard to keep track of how much of actually gotten in.this makes life so much more simple and j don't have to use my calculator anymore 😀😀

title: New user
body: New user. Love this app, especially the bar code scanner. This will really help with weight loss and eating smarter overall.

title: Great macro tracker
body: The bar code scanner is on point.

title: Disappointed
body: I bought this app for myself and my BF. We both agree that although the app has some functional features, it is pretty time consuming to use. Bar code scanning was virtually useless. The interface looks dated and just plain ugly. For a paid app, I was really expecting alittle more. After 2.5 weeks of using mymacros, I had to go back to MFP. I wanted to love it but it needs work!

title: Best food tracking / macro out there
body: I have been an avid MFP user for a long time and purchased the Premium service when it came out. I am a certified Fitness Nutrition Specialist and wanted to be able to recommend a more affordable option to my clients so I downloaded this app and started tracking my food on it. Yes, the food database is smaller than that of MFP (MFP database oftentimes is inaccurate), but it is really easy to add foods to it and once you do they are there.

title: Barcode scanner worthless
body: Tried using the barcode scanner on this app. Scanned the item, then had to "pick a similar item" from a list in which none of the items were similar. So then had to create my own item to then pick from the list to associate with the barcode, making the scanner completely useless because I end up typing in the entire nutrition label anyways! To top it off, it freezes on the barcode screen and doesn't even let me complete entering the item. I literally have to restart my phone to get back to the main screen or anywhere else in the app. Please.fix.the.problem!

title: Bar code scanner ruined a 5-star
body: This app is awesome ... Except the bar code scanner and food database.  This could have easily been one of the best fitness/health apps otherwise.

title: Waste of $
body: Hard to use, confusing app, bar code has yet to work for any of my foods. I have nothing good to say about this app. 3 bucks down the toilet.

title: Nice interface but still needs more time.
body: I really wanted to love this app. The interface is nice and it has promise. I didn't like the bar code reader. It doesn't give you a box outline to align your bar code in like other apps. After scanning good items the nutritional facts to match the food label. The search feature couldn't find my foods. I'm sticking with MFP for now.

title: Needs some work
body: It's a good base, but needs some work.

title: Very Promising Calorie/Macro Tracker!
body: Incredibly handy for detailed tracking of macros.

title: Very cool
body: I really like this app! Bar code scanner is awesome! Easy way to keep track and learn how to eat wiser! Thanks!!

title: MyMacros
body: Excellent app.  Easy to use & the bar code feature is very convenient!

title: The BEST macro app ever
body: I've been using Myfitnesspal and Mynetdiary apps for awhile to try track macros. They are good, but they do not come even close to My.Macros. The most amazing app EVER, incredible easy to use and the ability to customize your macros daily, it is just insane. I am carb cycling and could not be happier to have found My.Macros. Cheers Jason.

title: Very impressed
body: Bar code scanner is awesome. Don't have to manually enter any macro data and it has all my food types in the system- saves time! Love it!

title: Amazing!
body: This app has changed my life. Thanks for creating it!

title: Wonderful App
body: Made calculating my macros 100% easier.

title: Great but won't open in iphone
body: Will not open on my iphone since the update. It crashes immediately.
